original_text: They shall lift up their voice, they shall sing for the majesty of the Lord, they shall cry aloud from the sea.
korean_text: 무리가 소리를 높여 부를 것이며 여호와의 위엄으로 말미암아 바다에서부터 크게 외치리니

sentences.original_text: They shall lift up their voice
they shall sing for the majesty of the Lord
they shall cry aloud from the sea
